name: One Last Chance (itch)
description:
A reskin of Frogger that replaces navigating a roadway with navigating a difficult conversation.

Created by Carl Erez, Mark Medved, and Lucio Espinoza for CMPM 80K at UCSC, Winter quarter 2020.

Additional Credits

hang up phone by Tawny Whatmore from the Noun Project

phone ringing sound by HowardFromBroward from Freesound

Kausan Script Font by Impallari Design
